jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Can you engineer a brighter tomorrow?

Itâ€™s crystal clear: the actions we take in the next few years will significantly impact our future. At Volvo Cars, we embrace change. Weâ€™re committed to transforming the automotive industry and leading in electrification. For this, weâ€™re seeking out the most creative minds to shape that future. Donâ€™t miss this opportunity to create your tomorrow.

Who are we?

The Remote Functions department contributes to the overall connected experience of our customers. We build, provide, and operate a highly secure run-time ecosystem for functions and applications serving our connected cars, including the basis for industry-leading Volvo Cars mobile app.

Every day we make life less complicated for hundreds of thousands of people by giving them remote access to the car from the comfort of their couch. With the app you can, for instance, start, heat and prepare the car for your trip by sending your destination to the car, either from your phone, tablet or your watch.

What will you do?

We are currently looking for Engineers at mid or senior level.

As an Engineer at our Krakow Tech Hub, you will be a part of an agile team, which is currently engaged in development and roll-out of new remote car control functionality.

Our Remote Functions development teams work cross functionally and create functionalities in both Android and iOS. The team is responsible for an end-to-end process â€“ from the moment of touching a phone screen to the moment of activating the function in the car itself.

And yes â€“ you get to test your solutions in an actual test car.

What you'll bring?
â€¢ At least 4 years on hands-on commercial Swift experience and strong understanding of the iOS platforms and frameworks.
â€¢ Documented experience of released applications or open-source projects, either by your own accord or as a member of a team.
â€¢ Experience in writing testable and maintainable code.
â€¢ BSc degree in a Computer Science-related field or equivalent work experience as a mobile apps Software Developer.
â€¢ Fluency in spoken and written English.

Volvo Cars - Driving change togetherâ€‹

Volvo Carsâ€™ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, allowing you to reach your fullest potential.â€‹

By 2025, we aim to sell 1.2 million cars annually, with 50 per cent being electric cars and sold directly to customers mainly through digital channels. Join us on this exciting journey as we pioneer the driving and electrification technologies of the future.â€‹

Curious about Life at Volvo Cars? Read more here

Curious about our story? Read more here

jobs_results.title: Middle iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
At airSlate, our journey began in Boston, USA, in 2008. What started as a single product with 3,000 customers has grown into an influential tech company with 1000+ team members across six offices worldwide. In 2022, airSlate reached a total valuation of $1.25 billion and became a 'Unicorn ðŸ¦„'. But even as we scale, team members remain our most valuable asset. That's why we've built a company that excites people about their work.

We develop products that serve over 100 million users with no-code workflow automation, electronic signature, and document management solutions. The company's portfolio of award-winning products, signNow, pdfFiller, DocHub, WorkFlow, Instapage, and US Legal Forms, empower teams to digitally transform the way their organizations run.

About pdfFiller team:

We are a passionate and ambitious team of 120+ people on a mission to succeed with our online PDF creator and editor â€“ pdfFiller.

pdfFiller empowers over 10 million users every month to create and edit PDFs, send them for signing, and securely store documents within a single application. Offering unlimited storage, unlimited templates, and cross-platform integration, pdfFiller is the only PDF editor needed to get your document done.

And now, we are looking for iOS Developer who is prepared to contribute to the next chapter of our company's growth.

What you'll be working on:
â€¢ Maintain and develop new features for the main pdfFiller iOS application and support several additional apps.
â€¢ Write and maintain high-quality code within the existing application architecture, with a strong focus on reliability and performance.
â€¢ Collaborate closely with the team to ensure a high-quality user experience.
â€¢ Participate in planning sessions, feature decomposition, and architectural decisions
â€¢ Contribute to team discussions on functional and non-functional requirements
â€¢ Support code reviews, and adopt best practices

What we expect from you:
â€¢ 3 years of commercial experience in iOS development
â€¢ Strong knowledge of Swift/ObjC
â€¢ Knowledge of reactive programming (Combine/RxSwift)
â€¢ Strong understanding and application of OOP principles, SOLID principles and design patterns
â€¢ Multi-threading (aync/await will be a plus)
â€¢ Experience with Flutter
â€¢ Proficiency in UIKit markup from code
â€¢ Familiarity with Git workflows, code reviews, and collaboration in a team environment
â€¢ English level - fluent

What helps you rock:
â€¢ Experience in working on a product with a large active user base, including analytics, application stability metrics, and A/B testing
â€¢ Proficiency in Ukr/Rus languages will be an advantage

What we offer:

â€” Flexible work environment â€” We value the advantages of in-person collaboration and prioritize work from our offices in Wroclaw or Bialystok. However, we also provide flexible work arrangements to accommodate remote or hybrid options and flexible scheduling.

â€” Professional growth opportunities â€” We are committed to ongoing improvement and welcome those passionate about learning. We cover professional development courses, conferences, literature, English classes, and more for each team member.

â€” Health and well-being â€” We prioritize the health and well-being of our team. This is why we provide a Luxmed subscription, a multisport card for every team member, access to the office's massage room, free lunches, and healthy in-office snacks to sustain your energy.

â€” Bonuses and compensation â€” On top of a competitive base salary, our team members are eligible for monthly performance bonuses of up to 10%, determined by their achievements, time commitment, and dedication.

â€” Stock options â€” At airSlate, our team members are more than employees; they're business partners. We issue stock options that grant ownership in the company, allowing everyone to share in its growth.

â€” Open communication â€” We encourage transparent communication from all team members at airSlate. Feel free to share your thoughts, ideas, and concerns with our management team, CEO, any member of our leadership team, or any team lead at any time.

We are proud of:

â€” airSlate Care for Ukraine â€” With a significant number of our team members in Ukraine, our foremost concern was ensuring their safety by providing both financial and logistical assistance to them and their families. What started as an immediate response has evolved into a cornerstone of the airSlate charity program. We match donations contributed by our team members, offer humanitarian aid to those affected by the conflict, distribute food packages to seniors, and support animal shelters. Our commitment remains steadfast in working towards restoring peace to Ukraine.

â€” airSlate Junior Club â€” Our sense of family extends beyond our team. All team members with children gain access to the airSlate Junior Club, featuring engaging events such as cooking classes, creative activities, and educational online games.

It is airSlate's policy to comply with all applicable equal employment opportunity laws by making all employment decisions without unlawful regard or consideration of any individualâ€™s race, religion, ethnicity, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expressions, transgender status, sexual and other reproductive health decisions, marital status, age, national origin, genetic information, ancestry, citizenship, physical or mental disability, veteran or family status or any other basis protected by applicable national, federal, state, provincial or local law. airSlate's policy prohibits unlawful discrimination based on any of these impermissible bases, as well as any bases or grounds protected by applicable law in each jurisdiction. If you need assistance or an accommodation during the application process because of a disability, it is available upon request. airSlate is pleased to provide such assistance and no applicant will be penalised as a result of such a request. Pursuant to relevant law, where applicable, airSlate will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.

Read our Recruitment Privacy Notice to Learn how we process your personal information.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Can you bring your experience to our team at ASSA ABLOY? Join our team based in ZabierzÃ³w, Poland and enjoy a collaborative culture that empowers you to build a career you can be proud of.

What would you do as our iOS Developer

As an iOS Developer in ASSA ABLOY Group Technology Team, central R&D unit, you would work together with creative, curious and competent engineers who create the next generation access control solutions. Being part of our Mobile Competence Center you would work on our configuration solution for IoT access control products, including SDK development, secure communication protocols and reference applications. As this is mainly backend development work including communication with embedded electronics devices, cloud services, security and cryptography, we expect you are eager to look beyond regular app development to investigate new areas and quickly learn to deliver wide-scope integrated solutions.

You would also be responsible for:
â€¢ SDK development according to IETF/RFC standards.
â€¢ Integrating with existing software components including hardware-in-the-loop.
â€¢ Automating release processes and testing as well as evaluating existing code base to seek improvements and upgrade.
â€¢ Collaborating with embedded engineers and testing with embedded products.
â€¢ Collaborating with cloud developers to test from cloud, through mobile to embedded.

The skills and experience you need

We are looking for someone who:
â€¢ has experience with Swift and at least basic knowledge of Objective-C.
â€¢ has experience with BLE communication protocol.
â€¢ has experience with designing REST API.
â€¢ has good communication skills.
â€¢ effectively communicate in the English language, both verbally and in writing.

It would be beneficial if you have experience with C coding and basic knowledge of working with embedded electronic devices, such as connecting and powering up. Familiarity with agile frameworks, methods, practices, and tools like Scrum, SAFe, Kanban, or XP would also be advantageous. Additionally, working experience with collaboration and project management tools such as JIRA, Confluence, and Miro would be valuable for this role. In this position, traveling to our other sites will be required.

What we offer

Weâ€™re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us â€“ hereâ€™s what we have to offer:
â€¢ Learning and career development opportunities, whether itâ€™s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills.
â€¢ A competitive salary and incentive schemes.

We review applications regularly, so donâ€™t wait

We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply here.

To make sure your personal data is safe, we donâ€™t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Dominika Nalepa, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at dominika.nalepa@assaabloy.com

Letâ€™s create a safer and more open world - together!

To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com

We are the ASSA ABLOY Group
Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 61,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces â€“ physical and virtual â€“ safer, more secure, and easier to access.

As an employer, we value results â€“ not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions â€“ supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.

As we welcome new people on board, itâ€™s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

#LI-GRR

#LI-ZA1

jobs_results.title: iOS Software Engineer
jobs_results.description:
You will be responsible for developing new payment features that solve merchant regional & business specific needs.

Being part of a mission team based in Poznan (Poland) and Munich (Germany), you will be responsible for delivering functionalities end-to-end from our mobile SDKs and apps to our backend java/kotlin microservices - implement, write tests, deploy and perform QA. Therefore, we are looking for a developer interested in contributing, learning and growing in implementing features end-to-end.

Essential Functions:

â€¢ Design and implement contracts between mobile SDKs, apps and backend services, work together with the team on having business logic delivered.
â€¢ Grow into a joining point for mobile and backend activities.
â€¢ Suggest, drive and support improvements to the mobile platform.

This is a hybrid position. Hybrid employees can alternate time between both remote and office. Employees in hybrid roles are expected to work from the office 2-3 set days a week (determined by leadership/site), with a general guidepost of being in the office 50% or more of the time based on business needs.

Basic Qualifications

â€¢ Bachelors degree, OR 3+ years of relevant work experience

Preferred Qualifications

â€¢ 2 or more years of work experience as iOS Developer

â€¢ Proven knowledge of the iOS Platform and fluent Swift.

â€¢ Bonus: You have experience developing mobile frameworks for other teams and/or clients.

â€¢ You have a good understanding of clean code principles (SOLID, KISS, DRY, Clean Architecture).

â€¢ Yourâ€™re not bound to one single technology and the desire to learn Android and Backend technologies them as a second speciality is part of your DNA.

â€¢ Strong problem solving and analytical skills.

â€¢ You have good communication skills and are fluent in English.

Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
So, who are we?

So, who are we? Hello, weâ€™re IG Group. No, not Instagram â€“ though we're a pretty big deal ourselves. Weâ€™re a global, FTSE 250-listed company made up of a collection of progressive fintech brands in the world of online trading and investing. The best part? Weâ€™ve snapped up many awards for our top-class platforms, forward-thinking products, and incredible employee experiences.

We believe in financial freedom. And our purpose is to help ambitious people achieve it. Around 400,000 people use our groundbreaking technology and forward-thinking platforms to trade the financial products they know and love.

Did we mention we have offices in 18 countries? Yes, when you join IG Group, you'll have the chance to work across multiple brands, with people all over the world. Join us for an exciting future and letâ€™s innovate together!

Your role in the team

We are seeking a talented iOS Developer to join our team. You will design, develop, and maintain our applications, changing multiple systems from back to front end.

EU & EM Divsion is organize with multiple squads to fullfill the customer needs and with the goal of delivering value quickily starting with MVP.

You'll work closely with the business (from the European leadership), making key decisions about the product. Our team values and promotes XP practices, including pair programming, TDD (Test-Driven Development), and continuous integration (CI), to foster collaboration and ensure code quality. We value high engineering standards and will use Dora Metrics to measure and improve our delivery process. If you're passionate about delivering exceptional user experiences, thrive in a self-organized team, and seek continuous improvement, join our innovative and collaborative ETP Team.

Embrace Change!!!!

What Youâ€™ll Do

You will be part of our new team of EU& EM Developers, working on Mobile, focusing on the areas of Account opening, Trading Platform and Payments

We Adhere To The Following Strategic Principles
â€¢ Adopting an API-first approach to ensure seamless integration and scalability.
â€¢ Employing Microservices facilitate the split of monolithic
â€¢ Embracing an AWS Cloud-first strategy to leverage its powerful infrastructure and services.

If you are enthusiastic about working closely with the business in an XP (Extreme Programming) environment, we encourage you to apply.

Who Weâ€™re Looking For

Youâ€™re curious about things like the client experience, the rapid developments in tech, and the complex world of fintech regulation. Youâ€™re also a confident, creative thinker with a knack for innovating. We know that you know every problem has a solution. Here, you can try new ideas, and lead the way in creating inspiring experiences for our clients and everyone around you.

We donâ€™t fit the corporate stereotype. If you want to work for a traditional, suit-and-tie corporate that just gives you a pay cheque at the end of the month, we might not be for you. But, if you have that IG Group energy and you can stand behind what we believe in, letâ€™s raise the bar together.

What Youâ€™ll Need For This Role
â€¢ Approx. 5+ years of experience in iOS development with a strong portfolio of released applications on the App Store.
â€¢ Proficiency in Swift.
â€¢ Experience with modern engineering practices is a big plus: pair programming, TDD, trunk-based development, etc.
â€¢ Familiarity with mobile architecture patterns.
â€¢ Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and integration with backend services.
â€¢ Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks.
â€¢ Excellent problem-solving skills and a quality-oriented mindset.
â€¢ Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
â€¢ Open to learning and adopting new technologies, including cross-platform mobile frameworks.

How Youâ€™ll Grow

When you join IG Group, we want you to have more than a job â€“ we want you to have a career. And you can. If you spot an opportunity, we want you to chase it. Stretch yourself, challenge your self-beliefs and go for the things you dream of. With internal and external learning opportunities, and the tools to help you skyrocket to success, weâ€™ll support you all the way.

And these opportunities truly are endless because we have some bold targets. We plan to expand our global presence, increase revenue growth, and ultimately deliver the worldâ€™s best trading experience. Weâ€™d love to have you along for the ride.

The perks

It Really Is More Than a Job. Weâ€™ll Recognise Your Talent And Make Sure That You Can Still Have a Life â€“ At Work, And Outside Of It. Networks, Committees, Awards, Sports And Social Clubs, Mentorships, Volunteering Opportunities, Extra Time Offâ€¦ The List Goes On
â€¢ Flexible working hours & hybrid working
â€¢ Home office equipment reimbursement
â€¢ Performance-related bonus
â€¢ Private medical cover for you and your family/partner (Medicover)
â€¢ Multikafeteria system (you can choose a multisport card, vouchers, etc.)
â€¢ Life insurance (Generali)
â€¢ Employee-led LGBTQ+, Womenâ€™s, Black, and Parents & Carers networks with an annual budget for organizing events & projects that foster an open, diverse, and inclusive culture
â€¢ Career-focused technical and leadership training in-class and online, incl. unlimited access to the LinkedIn Learning platform
â€¢ Well-being events as well as Employee Assistance Programme
â€¢ Summer picnic, New Year party and other social events
â€¢ 3 additional days off a year - 1 to celebrate your Birthday and 2 for voluntary work

Where youâ€™ll work

We follow a hybrid working model; we reckon itâ€™s the best of both worlds. This model also feeds into our secret ingredients for innovation: diversity, flexibility, and close connection. Plus, youâ€™ll be welcomed into a diverse and inclusive workforce with a lot of creative energy.

Ask our employees what their favourite thing is about working at IG, and youâ€™ll hear an echo of â€˜our cultureâ€™! Thatâ€™s because you can come to work as your authentic self. The things that make you, you â€“ like your ethnicity, sexual orientation, faith, age, gender identity/expression or physical capacity â€“ can bring a fresh perspective or new skill to our business.

Thatâ€™s why we welcome people from various walks of life; and anyone who wants to help us realise our vision and strategy.

So, if youâ€™re keen to connect with our values, and lead the charge on innovation, you know what to do.

Not what you are looking for? Try these related job searches

iOS Developer jobs in Krakow

IG Group careers in Krakow

QA Engineer jobs in Krakow

Forex jobs in Krakow

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
ðŸš€ What's the position?

This is a Full-time Senior iOS Developer position at Neybox for talented individuals who want to work on cutting-edge applications that positively impact the well-being of individuals worldwide.

ðŸ’« What will I be working on?

You'll be working on our two apps: Pillow, a sleep-tracking app, and Today, which is a quantified-self wellness app.

Both apps have won an Editors' Choice distinction and have been featured multiple times in press and media. They have millions of users worldwide and a great roadmap ahead.

ðŸ§‘â€ðŸ’» What will be my role and responsibilities?

As a senior developer you will be responsible for
â€¢ Building new features
â€¢ Fixing bugs
â€¢ Maintaining the existing codebase
â€¢ Writting Unit Tests for existing and new features
â€¢ Making sure the documentation of the project is accurate and helpful
â€¢ Doing research on new technologies and frameworks
â€¢ âš ï¸This is a position that requires a commitment of 40 hours per week. This is not a part-time position.

ðŸ› ï¸ What's the tech stack?

In a nutshell:

Both our apps are written in Swift (MVVM and MVC).

The UI is written in SwiftUI and UIKit.

We write Unit Tests; the code is clean and well-documented.

We make extensive use of various frameworks and machine learning.

Both apps are available for iOS only.

ðŸŒ Can I work remotely?

Of course! Our team is 100% remote. We have flexible working hours, but a good overlap between our time zones is required.

ðŸ™Œ What is it like working at Neybox?

Our team is small by design (6-8 people). However, we work closely together every day (Mon-Fri). For coordination, we use Slack and Jira and keep meetings at a minimum.

There's no middle management to get in the way, and we encourage new ideas and close collaboration.

ðŸ’¼ What are the requirements?
â€¢ 4+ years of iOS development experience in Swift
â€¢ Experience in HealthKit, CoreML SwiftUI, UIKit, Core Animation, GCD, Core Data, and WatchKit.
â€¢ Experience working with Git version control, Unit testing, and Continuous Integration
â€¢ Experience in performance profiling with Instruments on Xcode.
â€¢ Proficient use of English, both writing and speaking.
â€¢ Willingness to learn and experiment with new technologies.
â€¢ References from previous employers in written or spoken form may be required from previous employers.
â€¢ Proficient in usage of MacOS and iOS.

ðŸ“¥ Great! How can I apply?

Just hit "Apply" button below!

âš ï¸ Please note that this is the only acceptable way to apply. All other ways of contacting Neybox about the position (social media, LinkedIn, email etc.), will result in immediate rejection.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer (Swift experience)
jobs_results.description:
Our client is an innovative company revolutionizing the commercial real estate industry by providing technologically advanced solutions for shopping centers and retailers. iOS Developer (Swift experience)

We kindly inform you that we will only respond to selected applications.

TeamQuest has been added to the register of entities conducting employment agencies by the Marshal of the Mazowieckie Voivodship under the number 11118.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Join us as an iOS Developer and Craft Top-Notch Mobile Solutions for one of the biggest Polish banks!

ÅÃ³dÅº- based opportunity with hybrid work model (2 days in the office/month)

As an iOS Developer, you will be working for our client, one of the leaders in online banking, on the development and maintenance of their mobile application, specifically focusing on the payments area. You will play a key role in designing solutions, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring the delivery of high-quality software. The role involves both technical expertise and close cooperation with business stakeholders to create a seamless user experience.

Your main responsibilities: Lead projects focused on developing and maintaining the mobile payments application
â€¢ Develop mobile features for the payments domain
â€¢ Ensure the application architecture meets business and technical requirements
â€¢ Participate in the implementation of new solutions
â€¢ Collaborate closely with UI/UX designers
â€¢ Design solutions based on accessibility criteria (WCAG)
â€¢ Work with business representatives to gather and refine requirements
â€¢ Cooperate with other IT teams to ensure smooth integration
â€¢ Support handling customer complaints related to mobile payments
â€¢ Conduct testing and ensure software quality

Youâ€™re ideal for this role if you have:
â€¢ A higher education degree in a relevant field
â€¢ At least 2 years of experience in iOS development
â€¢ Knowledge of Swift 5/6
â€¢ Experience in multi-project and multi-module environments
â€¢ Knowledge of client-server application architecture
â€¢ Familiarity with Agile methodologies
â€¢ Proficiency with version control tools (Git, Bitbucket, GitHub)
â€¢ Strong understanding of object-oriented and protocol-oriented programming (OOP/POP)
â€¢ Knowledge of architectural patterns (MVVM + C, DI, MVC)
â€¢ Practical experience with SwiftUI, UIKit, AFNetworking, Websockets, and Firebase
â€¢ Experience in writing unit and functional tests (XCTest, UI tests, E2E tests, SnapshotTesting)
â€¢ Experience with CI/CD tools (TeamCity, Jenkins)
â€¢ Familiarity with Signing & Capabilities
â€¢ Deep knowledge of SOLID, YAGNI, KISS, DRY principles

It is a strong plus if you have:
â€¢ Familiarity with Tuist and Swinject

jobs_results.title: SENIOR IOS DEVELOPER
jobs_results.description:
â€¢ Developing new features in an agile environment using the latest technology (Swift) for a client in the German financial industry.
â€¢ Continuous improvement of the codebase (refactoring for performance, clean code, etc.).
â€¢ Maintenance and improvement of build/deployment pipelines (ex. using Jenkins).
â€¢ Ability to support Junior Developers.
â€¢ You meet with your team in the office once a month to plan your work and discuss progress.

Benefits
â€¢ Medical Care
â€¢ Benefits Platform
â€¢ Training Opportunities
â€¢ Language Courses Platform
â€¢ Company Events
â€¢ Motivizer Benefits Platform to choose and manage all your benefits in one place. You receive a budget (550 PLN monthly). You can choose medical care package, meal tickets, sports cards (we have Multisport and on preferential terms, we have membership cards to one of the most popular Gyms), cinema tickets, shop vouchers, discounts and many more.
â€¢ Language Courses â€“ you'll have access to a multi-language learning platform enabling you to practice your language skills and learn new ones!
â€¢ Regular and systematic further training opportunities - both internally and from external providers. We support your ongoing learning and development.
â€¢ Cooperation within an internal community is our everyday reality. We have networking events, coding challenges, and company parties for different occasions.

Qualifications
â€¢ Deep understanding of development in iOS using e.g. Swift, SwiftUI.
â€¢ Knowledge of different design patterns (e.g. MVVM, VIPER).
â€¢ API integration knowledge (ex. Wallet API).
â€¢ At least 5 years of experience in mobile development.
â€¢ Very good communication skills in English, level C1 or higher.
â€¢ Communication skills in German is a plus.
â€¢ Successful completion of higher education as a qualified IT specialist or university degree in computer science.
â€¢ Banking project experience is a plus.
â€¢ Kotlin/Android knowledge is a plus.

About Fincon Reply

Fincon Reply is a consulting and solutions company specializing in banks, the savings bank financial group, and the insurance industry.

In the banking segment, Fincon Reply advises major banks, the cooperative financial group, and selected foreign and specialist banks on specialist, technical, process-related, and project methodological issues.

Fincon Reply Business Unit in Poland is a new rapidly growing department, focused on programming services.

www.fincon.eu

How to become a Replyer

Level 1

Your application

You found an opportunity that suits you and your abilities? Perfect! Use our application form to send us your resume and credentials. Once we received your documents, you will get a confirmation via email.

Level 2

Our reply

We will now review your application and come back to you as soon as possible. If itâ€™s a match, we will contact you for an interview.

Level 3

Your interview

Is it a fit? Do we match your expectations? What about the job requirements and the workplace? All that will be covered in the interview. If more than one Reply company is suitable for you, you have the possibility to participate in several interviews!
